item.title: Asylum seeker who murdered man inside bank jailed
item.description: Haybe Cabdiraxmaan Nur is jailed for life for the murder of 37-year-old Gurvinder Johal.

item.title: New videos show executions after militia takes key Sudan city
item.description: RSF troops executed a number of unarmed people after seizing el-Fasher, videos reviewed by BBC Verify show.

item.title: Starmer declines to rule out breaking manifesto tax pledges
item.description: The prime minister fails to repeat a promise not to raise income tax rates, VAT or National Insurance next month.

item.title: How 'incredible' Pepper caught Borthwick's eye after 'bump in road'
item.description: England flanker Guy Pepper was first identified by Steve Borthwick in 2022 and will now start against Australia.

item.title: Vinicius Jr apologises to Real Madrid fans
item.description: Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr apologises to supporters for his reaction to being substituted in Sunday's fiery El Clasico win against Barcelona.
